definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur

sentences.english: A Burundian cyclist pedals downhill on May 11.
sentences.chinese: 5月11日，一个布隆迪骑车人踩着脚踏冲坡。

sentences.english: Mugere Hydropwer Station of the Republic of Burundi , Africa, as aid construction by the chinese government.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府援建的非洲布隆迪共和国穆杰雷水电站。

sentences.english: The central African nation of Burundi is a new arrival to the bottom 10.
sentences.chinese: 中非国家布隆迪是新进榜者，排名前十名榜单尾部。

sentences.english: Burundi's army is the main user of peat stoves.
sentences.chinese: 布隆迪部队是炭炉的主要用户。

sentences.english: She also has country experience from working in rural hospitals in Burundi.
sentences.chinese: 她也有国家经验，曾经在布隆迪的乡村医院中工作过。

sentences.english: But the country plans to sell peat stoves to civilians, too.
sentences.chinese: 但是布隆迪政府也计划把炭炉卖给平民百姓。

sentences.english: Approximately 80% of Burundians live in poverty and according to the World Food Programme 57% of children under 5 years suffer from chronic malnutrition.
sentences.chinese: 大约80%的布隆迪人过着贫穷的生活。

sentences.english: Al-Shabab has also made new threats to target Burundi's capital, Bujumbura.
sentences.chinese: 青年党还威胁将袭击布隆迪首都布琼布拉。

sentences.english: We are just hoping the government of Burundi will reconsider, " Brody said."
sentences.chinese: 我们只是希望布隆迪政府将重新考虑，“布罗迪说。

sentences.english: The FNL is still fighting a civil war with the Burundian government.
sentences.chinese: 民族解放阵线还在和布隆迪政府打内战。
